---

## Summary
Briefly describe the bug.

## Steps to reproduce
1. Go to ...
2. Click on ...
3. See error

## Expected behavior
What should have happened instead?

## Actual behavior
What is happening now?

## Screenshots / logs
If applicable, add screenshots or console logs.

## Related issues
- Blocks: #
- Depends on: #

## Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Bug is reproducible with documented steps
- [ ] Fix is implemented
- [ ] Tests cover the fix
